name: projects.tags.base
description: Project Tags (BASE) denote project capability at all levels and are only configurable by a Facility Operator

api_endpoints.description: GET: List of Projects Tags options using optional 'search' parameter
PATCH: overwrite Projects Tags when found in request body

key_value_pairs.VM.NoLimitCPU: allows to create VMs with more than 2 CPU cores
key_value_pairs.VM.NoLimitRAM: allows to create VMs with more than 10 GB of RAM
key_value_pairs.VM.NoLimitDisk: allows to create VMs with more than 10 GB of disk
key_value_pairs.Component.GPU: allows to provision and attach GPU components
key_value_pairs.Component.FPGA: allows to provision and attach FPGA components
key_value_pairs.Component.SmartNIC: allows to provision and attach 25G and 100G dedicated SmartNIC components
key_value_pairs.Component.Storage: allows to create and attach rotating storage
key_value_pairs.Component.NVME: allows to provision and attach NVME components
key_value_pairs.Net.FABNetv4Ext: allows to create slices with public IPv4 connectivity
key_value_pairs.Net.FABNetv6Ext: allows to create slices with public IPv6 connectivity
key_value_pairs.Net.NoLimitBW: allows to provision links over 10 Gbps
key_value_pairs.Net.PortMirroring: allows to create slices that include port mirroring
key_value_pairs.Net.AllFacilityPorts: allows to create slices with any facility port
key_value_pairs.Slice.Multisite: allows to create slices spanning multiple sites
key_value_pairs.Slice.NoLimitLifetime: allows to create slices with a lifetime beyond default limit X time units without the need to renew
key_value_pairs.Slice.OnlyEDUKY: allows to create slices only on EDUKY
